data.message:
God warns of this life style!  I will pray for all of those people to come to know the truth of the Lords. Repent and do not sin again!
 The Fear of the Lord is Wisdom.

replies.message: I am going to assume you say this because you were born in a country in majority of Christianity. If I'm right, you'd be preaching in another religion if you were born elsewhere with a different stance in religion. I'm completely straight but that doesn't stop me from supporting those who are different than me. Isn't forgiveness a thing in Christianity is it not?
